article_metadata.description: House Speaker Paul Ryan, R-Wis., spoke recently about the Affordable Care Act and a possible Republican alternative, which really is no plan at all. The key would be to eliminate the prohibition against insurance companies pricing coverage or denying coverage based on a pre-existing medical condition. This prohibition is the most universally appreciated provision of the ACA (or Obamacare).

og.title: Obamacare alternative no improvement
